code: import Web3 from'web3';import getRpcUrl from'utils/getRpcUrl';var RPC_URL=getRpcUrl();var httpProvider=new Web3.providers.HttpProvider(RPC_URL,{timeout:10000});var web3NoAccount=new Web3(httpProvider);var getWeb3NoAccount=function getWeb3NoAccount(){return web3NoAccount;};export{getWeb3NoAccount};export default web3NoAccount;
